summary: #TweakTeam at it again, dishing out new mods! This time it's my turn, and boy you just might find this download worthy! Adds a cute minidragon at the Throat of the World, who can be recruited as a follower. Marriage is not enabled cos... That would just be weird!
descriptionHtml:
[color=turquoise][size=4]Looking to be partnered up with the opposite of a dragonborn, like a dragon with human blood in its veins?? Then this is the mod for you!
And no, this time the mod didn't begin from a fail, like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56310/?]Mila[/url] did...


As of 0.6, Areinko now squeaks like a gecko every now and then.


Areinko chasing a bandit
[youtube]vaisq0Bpc_I[/youtube]
Thanks VatiWah!
[youtube]UTapInjMWM8[/youtube]
It begins around 9:50
Another video, this time en fran[i]รง[/i]ais! Thanks FantastikLulu!
[youtube]AWq6ROaJ_6s[/youtube]


I went through a lot of trouble trying to make her faster. Now she's fast, but the animations are a bit off... Don't complain unless you know how to fix it! Cheers!


Areinko uses the revered dragon textures, so mods like [color=2B60DE][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56707/?]Darker Revered Dragon Texture by [b]JKalenad[/b][/url][/size][/color] should work fine with it! Cool how that just came out, ain't it?


Notes: If you're using UFO, don't tell her that she's naked, she might crash your computer... Happened to me! :D
She might take off and not come back... "help areinko" to console and add her back in! LOL
Her voice is quite... condescending, and is quite fun with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian
[/b][/url]She rests at the Throat of the World.


Requirements:
Legit Skyrim with Dawnguard DLC (As stated before, pirates belong to the caribbean, not the internet! Shame on you pirates.[color=C38EC7])


Credits:
[img]http://imgur.com/FK6apyM[/img]
Bethesda
My [color=C38EC7]m8s over in the chatroom[/color] (you know who you are!)
Elianora for absolutely wonderful [color=C38EC7]screenshots!
[/color]Undivided for providing me the gecko sounds!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29631/?]Bellyaches HD Dragon Replacer Pack by [b]Wrig675 [color=C38EC7]- used in Elianoras screenshots[/color][/b][/url]


Permissions:
Credit the ones I credited and go grazy!


[color=566D7E]Cool mods by #TweakTeam:[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56243/?][color=566D7E][b]
[/b][/color][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11534682/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Psychobreach[color=566D7E]s NPCs[color=566D7E], [color=566D7E]and cheatitems[/color][/color][/color]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1704351/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Sneaky_Squirrels combat/race tweaks[/url][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8265935/?tb=mods&pUp=1]There's also this ding-dongs mods[/url]

And as always, #TweakTeam takes requests for NPCs, tweaks, new races(very
WIP, working on one ATM), and last but not least, remodelings (WIP)
Thanks for checking this out, peace![/color][/size][/color]
author: XBitu from TweakTeam
